story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: *sigh* How many times has this happened?
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
The reason why Ultra Wormholes are appearing
on Pasio must be—
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: The Ultra Beasts seem to have calmed down.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: You must be tired. How about you get some rest?
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
And I have other Trainers keeping watch over
the town.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Is that because you tend to attract Ultra Beasts?
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: So you heard about that. Impressive.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You are correct. If I stay out of town, the damage
will be kept to a minimum.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
As long as I can protect everyone—especially the
Ultra Beasts—I am perfectly content with my role.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
And yet...dealing with the Ultra Beasts only when
they appear won’t solve the root problem.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Research data was stolen from the
Aether Foundation...
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Someone must be using it to intentionally make the
Ultra Wormholes appear.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
It’s possible my Necrozma is the cause, but it’s
been calm this whole time.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Though I can’t deny that Ultra Beasts
are appearing...
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Considering the recent increase in lost Pokémon...
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I think it’s more likely that someone is intentionally
opening Ultra Wormholes.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Something happened the other day while we were
working on Pokémon conservation.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2200_10:
We found another Pokemon with no Trainer, and
we suspect it came from an Ultra Wormhole.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Prince Lear said Hoopa played a similar trick
once before, but...
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2400_10:
we’ve confirmed that Hoopa is unable to return the
lost Pokémon to where they belong.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2500_10:
We believe this is because Hoopa doesn’t know
where they came from.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
So the increase in lost Pokémon is the direct result
of Ultra Wormholes being opened experimentally
over and over again.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I imagine Team Rocket’s objective is to acquire
rare Pokémon via the Ultra Wormholes.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_2900_10:
If Team Rocket is behind this, there’s one thing we
should keep in mind.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Considering their usual MO, I believe there’s a
significant chance that an informant is operating
inside the Aether Foundation.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_3100_10:
I can’t imagine we’d have anyone like that in
the foundation.
story_alola_01_05000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Yes. Branch Chief Faba said he was on the phone
with you, Madam President.
